alert.note: Alert for Hancock (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 1:32PM EDT until April 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Ohio, Belmont, Guernsey, Harrison, Jefferson OH, Monroe, Muskingum, and Noble Counties. In West Virginia, Hancock County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
